property.name: chart.gutter
property.description:
The size of the gutter.
Default: 25

property.name: chart.color
property.description:
The color of the bar. This can be a solid color, or a gradient that you create.
Default: #0c0

property.name: chart.background.color
property.description:
The background color.
Default: #eee

property.name: chart.tickmarks
property.description:
Whether the tickmarks are drawn.
Default: true

property.name: chart.value
property.description: The indicated value. You don't need to set this because it's one of the arguments to the constructor.

property.name: chart.max
property.description: The maximum value. You don't need to set this because it's one of the arguments to the constructor.

property.name: chart.numticks
property.description:
How many tick marks there are.
Default: 10

property.name: chart.orientation
property.description:
Either horizontal (the default) or vertical determining how the progress bar is shown.
Default: horizontal

property.name: chart.shadow
property.description:
Whether the progress bar has a shadow. This uses the canvas shadow API and therefore is only supported on Chrome 2, Safari 3.1 and Firefox 3.1 (and above).
Default: false

property.name: chart.shadow.offsetx
property.description:
The X offset of the progress bar shadow.
Default: 3

property.name: chart.shadow.offsety
property.description:
The Y offset of the progress bar shadow.
Default: 3

property.name: chart.shadow.color
property.description:
The color of the shadow.
Default: rgba(0,0,0,0.5)

property.name: chart.shadow.blur
property.description:
The blurring effect that is applied to the shadow.
Default: 3

property.name: chart.text.font
property.description:
The font used to render the text.
Default: Verdana

property.name: chart.text.color
property.description:
The color of the labels.
Default: black

property.name: chart.text.size
property.description:
The size of the text (in points).
Default: 10

property.name: chart.units.pre
property.description:
The units that the Y scale is measured in (these are preppend to the number).
Default: none

property.name: chart.units.post
property.description:
The units that the Y scale is measured in (these are appended to the number).
Default: none

property.name: chart.title
property.description:
The title of the progress bar.
Default: An empty string

property.name: chart.title.vpos
property.description:
This allows you to completely override the vertical positioning of the title. It should be a number between 0 and 1, and is multiplied with the gutter and then used as the vertical position. It can be useful if you need to have a large gutter.
Default: null

property.name: chart.title.color
property.description:
The color of the title.
Default: black

property.name: chart.tooltips
property.description:
An array, albeit one element only. This is shown when the progress bar is clicked on. This can contain HTML.
Default: An empty array

property.name: chart.tooltip.effect
property.description:
The animated effect used for showing the tooltip. Can be either fade or expand.
Default: fade

property.name: chart.labels
property.description:
Labels that are applied to the graph.
Default: An empty array

property.name: chart.contextmenu
property.description:
An array of context menu items. More information on context menus is here.
Default: [] (An empty array)

property.name: chart.annotatable
property.description:
Whether annotations are enabled for the chart (ie you can draw on the chart interactively.
Default: false

property.name: chart.annotate.color
property.description:
If you do not allow the use of the palette, then this will be the only colour allowed for annotations.
Default: black

property.name: chart.tickmarks.color
property.description:
The color used for tickmarks.
Default: black
